Text: Can I borrow your tinfoil hat?
that would have to be a huge tinfoil hat for the size of that ego!!

@zakimar1: Wow, it's a miracle how you're able to cram that much ignorance and bigotry into one pea-sized brain. Kudos.
There's plenty of ways to shoot you down, but how about this: the economies of Great Britain and Germany are very close indeed. If the IMF hadn't scammed Ireland, the UK would probably be stronger.
